Reviews.Title: Great ultrabook!
Reviews.Author: Massimiliano Piergentili
Reviews.Content: Pro: i7, good battery, good touch, great keypad, great keyboard, good price, very elegantCons: weights a little more than other ultrabook, but this is the cost of its feauters.Who should buy it? I am not a gamer so I don't know what is its performance there, but for work and travel is good, for students amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great computer with a few minor mouse pad issues.
Reviews.Author: Karina D.
Reviews.Content: This computer is pretty wonderful. It's fast and very responsive. I wasn't sure about the touch screen when I bought the computer but now that I've used it, it's awesome and almost a necessity for windows 8. My only complaint is with the mouse pad...  sometimes the mouse pad appears to stop working out of no where and then a few seconds later will be fine again. Also sometimes the mouse pad will cause you to zoom in and out of things when you aren't trying to do that at all. These issues are a small blemish in an otherwise great computer.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Andrew A.
Reviews.Content: Very happy with  function and value. Very nice finish  with the perfect  size and weight to  carry around all day.

Reviews.Title: Great computers
Reviews.Author: Simone Swail
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time in perfect condition.  The computer is great, fast touch screen is super responsive, no problems with the wireless.

Reviews.Title: I hate it
Reviews.Author: James Bennett
Reviews.Content: I made a call to Lenovo for help. What I got was nothing.  I should have purchased A dell  from Walmart.

ProductInfo.Features:
4th Gen Intel Core i7-4500U mobile processor 1.8GHz (with Turbo Boost up to 3.0GHz)
14" HD+ 10-point multitouch screen / Intel HD Graphics 4400
4GB DDR3L Memory / 500GB 2-in-1 hybrid hard drive with 8GB of NAND Flash memory
Built-in 720p webcam with microphones / NO DVD/CD Drive
Windows 8.1 64-bit / WLAN BGN / Bluetooth 4.0
ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo IdeaPad U430 Ultrabook 14" TouchScreen Laptop PC - 4th Gen Intel Core i7 / 4GB Memory / 500GB 2-in-1 hybrid HD / Intel HD Graphics 4400 / Webcam & Microphones / Windows 8.1 64-bit
